title: Desktop App & White-Label Reports
summary: Native desktop application with professional PDF/Excel exports and white-label branding.

changes.title: Native Desktop Application
changes.description: Electron-based desktop app for Windows (64-bit), macOS (Intel & Apple Silicon), and Linux (.deb, .AppImage).

changes.title: PDF Export with White-Label
changes.description: Generate professional PDF reports with your logo, colors, and branding. Remove "Powered by Crawlix" on Agency tier.

changes.title: Excel Export
changes.description: Formatted .xlsx spreadsheets with multiple sheets, styling, and white-label support.

changes.title: Interactive HTML Reports
changes.description: Shareable HTML reports with filtering, sorting, and data visualization.

changes.title: Scheduled Crawls
changes.description: Automate crawls on daily, weekly, or monthly schedules. Configure specific times and custom settings per schedule.

changes.title: White-Label Branding
changes.description: Custom company name, logo (Base64), primary/secondary/accent colors, and custom fonts for reports.

changes.title: Dark/Light Theme
changes.description: System theme detection with manual override. Theme persists across sessions.
